mapper.select: select callback from t_funtime_kuaishou_ad_monitor where idfa3 = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_toutiao_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select cid,sid,stime,os,idfa,mac,imei from t_funtime_wifi_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_zhihu_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_sohu_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_zuiyou_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_meipai_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_chubao_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select trackid from t_funtime_bstation_ad_monitor where idfa = #{idfa} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_kuaishou_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_toutiao_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select cid,sid,stime,os,idfa,mac,imei from t_funtime_wifi_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_zhihu_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_sohu_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback from t_funtime_zuiyou_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_meipai_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select callback_url from t_funtime_chubao_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
select trackid from t_funtime_bstation_ad_monitor where ip = #{ip} and channel = #{channel} and create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 day) and now() order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: replace into t_funtime_tencent_ad (click_id, muid, click_time, appid, advertiser_id, app_type, android_id, mac, ip, user_agent, campaign_id, adgroup_id, creative_id, agent_id, deeplink_url, dest_url, device_os_type, click_sku_id, process_time, product_type, request_id, site_set, adgroup_name, oaid) values (#{clickId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advertiserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campaignId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adgroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creativeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deeplinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceOsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickSkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteSet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adgroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

replace into t_funtime_tencent_ad_monitor (click_id, muid, click_time, ip, user_agent, campaign_id, adgroup_id, ad_id, ad_platform_type, account_id, agency_id, billing_event, promoted_object_type, real_cost, deeplink_url, universal_link, page_url, device_os_type, click_sku_id, process_time, promoted_object_id, impression_id, request_id, hash_android_id, hash_mac, callback, site_set, encrypted_position_id, ipv6, oaid, hash_oaid) values (#{clickId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campaignId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adgroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adPlatformType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billingEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotedObjectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deeplinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{universalLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceOsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotedObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impressionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashAndroidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteSet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{encryptedPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ipv6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashOaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_funtime_kuaishou_ad_monitor (os, aid, cid, did, dname, imei2, imei3, oaid, idfa2, idfa3, mac, mac2, mac3, android_id2, android_id3, ts, ip, csite, callback) values (#{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_funtime_toutiao_ad_monitor (cid, os, imeimd5, idfa, ts, tsms, callback_url, unit, plan, uid, ua, androididmd5, ip, oaid, dp_link,type) values (#{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{os,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imeimd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androididmd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type})

insert into t_funtime_bstation_ad_monitor (channel, trackid, creativeid, os, imei, mac1, idfa, aaid, androidid, oaid, ip, ua, ts, shopid, upmid ) values (#{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creativeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{os,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into t_funtime_sohu_ad_monitor (os, imei, oaid, idfa, idfa1, gid, aid, clickts, clickid, callback, ip, ua) values (#{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_funtime_meipai_ad_monitor (os, imei, oaid, idfa, customer_id, ad_group_id, ad_id, creative_id, ts, mt_link_source, uniid, callback_url, callback, ip ) values ( #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtLinkSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
